name: Luxurious
victoryScreenHeader:
Obtains all luxury resources
to win!
milestones: Build [The Grand Museum of Luxury Resources]
victoryString: You have obtained all the available luxury resources, and you have built 'The Grand Museum of Luxury Resources' to showcase your luxurious superiority to everyone.
defeatString: You have been defeated, another civilization has proven its superiority over you. From now on, when the world speaks of disgraceful, everyone will think of you.

name: Demographic
victoryScreenHeader:
Make your people happy, and build 'proofs of gratitude' to prove it
to win!
victoryString: You have obtained all the proofs gratitude, and you have built 'The Great dirigeants statue' to showcase your happiness superiority to everyone.
defeatString: You have been defeated, another civilization has proven its superiority over you. From now on, when the world speaks of sadness, everyone will think of you.
